rajakiya nawika hamudawa, rajakiya samudrika senawa saha rajakiya guwan hamudawa yannanta hathpasinma wiruddha lesin, brithanya yuddha hamudawe padawi namayehi rajakiya yanna nomaththe, parlimenthuwa saha rajanduwa athara aithihasika aragalayathata pasuwa, brithanya yuddha hamudawa samawitama wagakiyanne parlimenthuwata misa rajanduwata nowana bawini.[1]yuddha hamudawe boho sanghataka rejimenthu saha senangayan sandaha "rajakiya" yana upasargaya bhawitha kirimata awasara di athi athara samahara rejimenthu thula rajakiya pawule samajikayan hata jyeshta garu thanaththara darimata ida hara atha.
